dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation last night, I believe Bob is the assassin. We should vote for him to ensure safety in our village.

dialogue.message: I have an alibi for the night. I was at the tavern, drinking with some of the villagers. Let's focus on finding the real killer instead of pointing fingers at each other.
